title: I submitted a help ticket but didn't get a response!
body: Hey yall i just moved and ive been trying to log into my League account but its not working! Everytime i do it just endlessly is Authenticating... Please if anyone knows how to fix it ive already tried redownloading

replies.body:
Sounds like there's a connection issue somewhere along the way, but it's not an issue I'm super familiar with so I'd recommend persisting with support.

Do be aware that bumping (replying to) the ticket before you receive a response will drop you back to the bottom of the queue, so if you've done that just be patient.

I imagine support is getting a lot of tickets at the moment because of PBE drama, so it's likely there are some delays in response time.
